item.title: Assignments
item.description: The table below contains problem set assignments and due dates. Problems are from the course textbook, [BT] = Bertsimas, Dimitris, and John Tsitsiklis. Introduction to Linear Optimization. Belmont, MA: Athena Scientific, 1997. ISBN: 9781886529199. ASSN # PROBLEMS DUE DATES 1 [BT]: 1.2, 1.5, 1.11 Computation question: Consider the production planning problem on pgs 7-10 in [BT]. Using AMPL, solve the linear program as presented for this problem on pg 9. Hand in a printout of your .
